question.title: Check If Two Expression Trees are Equivalent
question.similarQuestions: [{"title": "Build Binary Expression Tree From Infix Expression", "titleSlug": "build-binary-expression-tree-from-infix-expression", "difficulty": "Hard", "translatedTitle": null}, {"title": "Minimum Flips in Binary Tree to Get Result", "titleSlug": "minimum-flips-in-binary-tree-to-get-result", "difficulty": "Hard", "translatedTitle": null}, {"title": "Evaluate Boolean Binary Tree", "titleSlug": "evaluate-boolean-binary-tree", "difficulty": "Easy", "translatedTitle": null}]
hints: Count for each variable how many times it appeared in the first tree.
Do the same for the second tree and check if the count is the same for both tree.
